content:
Hey folks, just an fyi but my ISP has been down for 24 hours and they’re saying it’s gonna be at least another day before they get a fix. Tethering from my phone is not working super well, who could have expected that an iPhone and Linux laptop wouldn’t work seamlessly together?

Anyways, my reviews/reaponses/etc will be coming slowly and somewhat delayed. Thanks for your patience!
Till Schneidereit has marked this topic as resolved.
